summary: Want to be a true paladin which can bring justice on any enemy who deserve it, but the three major spells of light from Dawnguard only affects undead? Justice need to be called upon all of your foes palaborn.
descriptionHtml:
Want to be a true paladin who can bring justice on any enemy which deserve it, but the three major spells of light from Dawnguard only affects undead? Justice need to be called upon all your foes palaborn.

Hello everyone, I'wanted to make a character as close to a paladin as possible, but, since the 3 sun powers from dawnguard only affect undead, I'thought it wasn't enough useful, so I've made some changes.

A mod which modifies Stendarr's Aura , Sun Fire and Vampire's Bane in order to target not only undead, but every enemy in skyrim, but not the damage dealt to them. I' ve changed the Aura so that it can do the same effect as ebony flesh in addition to the damage, a true divine armor.

If there is some mods on the images I've uploaded, none of them are used as assests for the creation of this mod, only Dawnguard was used

I'hope you will enjoy this mod, goodbye palaborns of skyrim, bring Justice and Freedom for all
author: geozz
